评论详情: I have a pair of Blundstone boots that I’ve never been able to break in. I even started to wonder if they were counterfeit boots. Then I got these. On day one I went for a three mile walk. My socks weren’t super thin but not thick either and these boots were perfect. No rubbing against my heel and the leather was not too stiff. One thing I did do was the night before wore them in the house for a few hours but otherwise they were great right out the box. Mind you these aren’t hiking boots but they were fine for a short urban walk. I bought my usual size. Unless they really stretch I probably will not be able to use with super thick socks. Also the rustic brown is gorgeous. Worth the money? You get what you pay for when it comes to shoes.  ETA: they did stretch and the next day wore thicker socks. Great boots.

类型: Size: 7 US Men / 9 US Women / 6 AUColor: Rustic Brown
评论详情: I want to start by saying that before buying these, I did a LOT of research. I'm hoping I can cut down the amount of research required for whoever reads this review!  Color: I got the Rustic Brown, it is ever so slightly darker than the picture, but not far off.  Sizing: Blundstone sizing is a little different from most US shoes. I bought the US Women's 9 / US Men's 7 size on Amazon. The shoes I got are an AU Size 6. This does translate to US Women's 9, I just wanted to mention that in case you are comparing the sizes to those listed on Blundstone's website. Blundstone's half sizes (eg 6.5) do NOT add any length to the shoes, they are effectively just a "wide" size (so Blundstone AU 6.5 is just an AU 6 Wide). I have very narrow feet, so I chose not to go with the half size, even though I typically wear a US Women's 8.5. Instead, I sized up to a US Women's 9, which was perfect for my feet. They do come with optional extra insoles, which I have not put in my shoes yet. As they stretch, I might end up needing the insoles, but I'm not sure yet.  Comfort: Incredible. These shoes are AMAZINGLY comfortable, I was absolutely shocked by this. Most leather boots that I've owned are very uncomfortable and need to be broken in, but these were comfortable enough to wear for full days from day one. They also have quite decent support for boots! The ankle area rubs a bit on my leg, but I've been wearing long socks to deal with this so far, and I think it will soften up soon. But even without the socks, it is not rubbing enough to be painful or too uncomfortable. They are also not too hard to put on or take off, even right out of the box.  I've hardly taken these off since I bought them, and I really can't recommend them enough. I hope they bring you as much joy as they've brought me!

评论详情: It's unthinkable what poor quality the soles on this amazing boot are. I've had this problem as well, but today it's my wife's one-year-old 500s. She's an average sized 5'4" person and gave these things the lightest wear around town. I've posted pictures of what happened to the soles, the inside are crumbly foam.  I see people online complaining that it didn't used to be this way with Blundes, years ago the soles were durable. But not now. The good news is there are a lot of places online that resole them with much better soles. The place I found uses a sole called Vibram 1705 and that one is strong, probably more like the old blundestone bottoms, cost $98 as of this writing. Today I'm sending my wife's to them as well.

评论详情: Been wearing these off-and-on for a little over a year now, hoping they would break in or conform to my feet a bit. The build quality is great, but even when wearing wool hiking socks the interior of the boot feels hard and uncomfortable, like walking barefoot on cement. Medium-high arches have no support, and because of the large toe box they don't stay warm.  On the bright side, they have almost zero wear in the year that I've worn them: no frayed stitching, no sole separation, no excessive heel wear and the leather is in good shape.  I tried throwing some happy feet insoles to replace the factory option, but the height left them squishing my toes.

I would suggest using extreme caution before purchasing Blundstone boots. I purchased the 1469’s last week (01/04/24) and when they arrived this week.  The left boot was larger than the right boot. I sent in a help request (because there is no phone number on their website, that I can find) with a video proving the left boot was larger than the right (too big for me) and have heard nothing. I have been a long time Blundstone customer, own several pair of Blundstones and admit they are comfortable (if you have a correct fit) but if it has come to this style of poor customer service I will not be purchasing or recommending any more Blundstone boots. It is a disgrace that one has to pay so much for a pair of boots and cannot speak or communicate with anyone from Blundstone when their product is a fail. Buyer be aware!!

I have worn Blunstone boots daily for work since about 2003. I really like this variety as it required almost no break-in very comfortable. Let’s see if the soles hold up better than the others I have worn.

类型: Size: 10.5 US Men / 12.5 US Women / 9.5 AUColor: Rustic Brown
评论详情: I've owned 5 pairs of these same boots over the years and will buy another pair after this one dies...and another after those. Best boots ever, period. Comfortable, versatile, convenient, supportive, and attractive. I wear them with khaki slacks to my office job and get lots of compliments on them. Then I leave the office and go walk the dogs or hike in them. Then I wear them while I rebuild my privacy fence. Then I wear them out to dinner with my wife. Then I wear them to roundhouse kick the bad guys who try to hassle us when we leave the restaurant.  They can be pricey but worth every bit and then some. I put them through the ringer and get about 4 years out of them, which no other boot I've found has been able to do. They no longer make them in Tasmania, which is a bummer, but the quality is still 95% of what they were then. As long as they keep it up, I'll be a customer for life.

类型: Size: 6.5 US Men / 8.5 US Women / 5.5 AUColor: Walnut Brown
评论详情: I purchased the model 585 in rustic brown in a size 10 mens. I measure to a 10D and 10E on brannock and normally wear a size 10M in running shoes and dress shoes. The boots fit generally good. They come with an extra set of insoles and I ended up adding the extra on the bottom underneath the ones they came with and it makes the fit overall very good. They are a somewhat roomy fit and not a lot of arch support. I have a somewhat high arch and a somewhat high instep and these boots would be more comfortable if they provided more arch support although the instep is not an issue as this tends to be a sore spot for me with pull ons like this. My ankles are a little bit narrow and there is a small amount of slip but this has not been an issue and is similar to wearing a western boot. The fit is overall roomy -- some may say a little sloppy. But they ARE quite comfortable and I'm finding the ownership experience to be very satisfying given the broad possible use cases and the overall comfort, look, fit, and price. I have worn them since I received them yesterday and have no sore spots and there is no break-in period from my standpoint. Workmanship appears to be overall good. There was a spot of glue on the top of the vamp of one of the boots but I was able to remove it (mostly) with a suede gum eraser. If I compare them to my work boots that I use for tractor work, chainsaw, mowing, etc, they are easier to wear than western style work boots and much lighter than the moc toe boots I wear when putting in a lot of steps. I don't perceive these as work boots although I COULD work in them but instead shoes for running errands, doing light chores, etc during the fall/winter.

类型: Size: 10 US Men / 12 US Women / 9 AUColor: Black
评论详情: I have been a loyal customer of these for many years, even though I had heard about the issue with soles that deteriorate. I just experienced it with my most recent pair and I will never buy them again. They did not just deteriorate, they fell apart into pieces. If you look online, there are countless threads and posts about this problem. I found another brand and will happily use those. I wrote to Blundstone, But have not received word back yet. For this kind of money, it’s unacceptable.  EDIT: they wrote me back fairly quickly, but the process for them to just examine the problem was onerous. ON TOP OF THAT, they wanted proof that it came from an official retailer. I got them from a reputable seller on Amazon, but they were apparently not sanctioned. Either way, I'm done with this company.

评论概述: Remove the insoles and get a better pair of insoles.
类型: Size: 10 US Men / 12 US Women / 9 AUColor: Walnut Brown
评论详情: I had a used pair that was in decent condition because I didn't want to drop so much on something I'm not sure I'd like and need time to get used to first. Transitioning from always wearing vans slip ons but sick of feet getting wet. I loved the used pair I got and had for several months and moved those to my messy job boots and decided to get everything else boots. After getting the new pair they seemed alright not as soft of insoles. I thought maybe they are just different types but after the bottom of my feet started to hurt in these new ones I pulled the insoles out of the used pair and they were the work boot insoles Walmart has. Grabbed a set and tossed em in my new boots after removing the old ones and it's a million times better. They are slightly thicker so the boot is a little snug now but not bad and might loosen a little with time.

类型: Size: 4.5 US Men / 6.5 US Women / 3.5 AUColor: Rustic Brown
评论详情: I ordered the antique brown but received the crazy horse model. When I clicked order and viewed it, the image would switch from antique brown to crazy horse. I was afraid it was going to be that bright yellow mustard color but when I received it I was so pleased it was not. It reminds me of the color of timbs. It was easy to put on. I’m usually a 6, 6.5 and I had ordered walnut brown in 3.5 but It was hard to put on. I returned those and ordered these in 4(7). I really liked them but it felt like it looked big? I like when my shoes look small and cute and fit a bit snug. I basically put an additional insole to get the snug fit I like but still didn’t fit the best.  I ordered some kid size blunnies on the website in a size 4 but says 3 on them and they fit great (more as they stretch)  So I returned these and I went back to a size 3 hoping they will fit. I wanted this mustard color for pairing with greens.  The rustic brown is more versatile though.  I think these blunnies are comfy but I wouldn’t say the most comfy eg think crocs.  I’m hoping with time they will fit better and feel better.  Can’t speak to the quality as just received them.  Overall, for the sale price, I’m thankful!  Edited to add *****  I received the 3.5 They are quite snug and such a bother to get off.. which the size 4 were as well. But they are cuter imo and hopefully will stretch some. Glad I switched back. I have other winter boots so I won’t be needing to wear tick socks with them.

The good: - Solid construction - Roomy toe box - generally comfy - break in only about 3 weeks - stay pretty dry, seem tough  The eh:  I had to put inserts in for a touch more support and to snug the fit a bit. What can I say: the rugged but not overdone look, the thrill of not having to do my laces, the smugness I feel whenever I'm out in a pair of Blunnies. They're the boots I've been longing for all my life. How did I manage to survive this far without them, and how can I imagine a life without a pair? The world won't understand my love for my Blunnies, this forbidden love, which is why I must hide it…  For realsies though, protip: swap out the insoles for softer or more ergonomic ones, invest in mid socks, and scuff up the leather a little—don't wear them just to walk around the block, go on an adventure!

类型: Size: 4.5 US Men / 6.5 US Women / 3.5 AUColor: Rustic Black
评论详情: I bought a pair of Blundstone 500 series boots in 2019 and have worn them everyday since. I recently ordered these BL587 Classic 550 Chelsea Boots to have a nicer pair (the heels were wearing down). The new boots were sized inconsistently and do not fit. My original pair are 6.5 (I wear US 9/9.5 women's). I received these new ones which were too small even though they are the same size as the last pair (6.5) I had which were perfect from day 1. I returned them and ordered another pair of the same size (maybe there was a manufacturing flaw in that pair?) and I also ordered a 1/2 size up (7) to compare. The 6.5 were tight, and the 7 was significantly loose/ too big. I kept the 6.5 thinking this is the size I wear in this brand and they'll wear in. It's been a few months and it hasn't happened and each time I war them my feet hurt. I don't know what changed, it feels like when just standing they fit fine, but when I walk, they don't prevent my foot from sliding forward to the toe box and squishing my toes. Blundstone apparently has inconsistent sizing. I'm going to try ordering the 500 series again and see if the issue is the style difference (though they both look like the same boot style/shape. I wrote to the company and they had zero concern for the inconsistency and had nothing to offer.

类型: Size: 11 US Men / 13 US Women / 10 AUColor: Rustic Brown
评论详情: At first I ordered a men's 10.5 but received a 7.5 so I sent those back. I then ordered a women's 11/men's 11. This was a gamble because there is no way of knowing if what was to arrive was going to be a women's 11 or a men's 11. The gamble paid off, though, because it turned out to be a men's 11 which is what I wanted. My true shoe size is a US 10.5 but I thought I would be safe getting a 1/2 size bigger which was a good call. The men's 11 fits like a men's 10.5. The only small issue is the top of the arch on the left boot is slightly tighter than the right. My feet are the same so it is the boot that is a little different. I do believe, however, that the leather is starting to stretch to accommodate that foot and the boot seems to be getting more comfortable on that side. The right foot was always perfect so no issues there. On the good side, these boots are absolutely beautiful and seem to be very high quality. They are expensive so they better be! I am very pleased with the purchase and would go through the effort again just because they are such nice boots. Stylish, comfortable, and great soles for traction in the snow. I love them. If it weren't for the confusion about the shoe sizes, I would have given 5 stars.

I had heard to go up a half size, and I’m glad I did! I normally wear an 8 and ordered an 8.5. It fits just right! There is enough space in the toe box without feeling squished. 评论概述: Nice but needs to be broken in
类型: Size: 9 US Men / 11 US Women / 8 AUColor: Rustic Brown
评论详情: These are nice boots but the quality seems lacking from what I expected from the reviews and price. The leather feels stiff and they don’t look as high quality as I expected. The fit is good, I’m a 10.5-11 womens and I ordered the US womens 11 / US mens 9 and I received an AU 8 which is exactly what I expected. They fit well, roomier in the toe box than most shoes which is great and just the right amount of room lengthwise. They are tight getting them on and off, I have a somewhat narrow foot and high arches and it’s a struggle getting them on and off but I’m hoping they loosen up. I’m really hoping they will get softer and more comfortable with wear. They have a chemical smell which kind of adds to the low quality feeling and I’m trying to let them air out for a while before wearing them. Overall I like them but expected better because of all the hype and the price. I love the style of them and I’m hoping that breaking them in will make them my favorites shoes.

类型: Size: 11.5 US Men / 13.5 US Women / 10.5 AUColor: Black
评论详情: Update: I reordered a size US 10 Womens/8 Mens and received a AUS 7, they fit perfect. I am always a US Womens 10 in boots, 10.5 in sneakers. I would not advise sizing up in width or length for women, since this is a unisex boot and pretty roomy, and the leather will stretch over time.  I believe this seller has both Australian (AUS) and US sizing listed. If the sizing has a Women’s size along with a Men’s size two sizes smaller (Womens 9, Men’s 7) - you’re ordering a US size. If the Women’s size and Mens size match (Womens 9, Men’s 9), its probably the AUS shoe size.  Past review: I ordered a Womens size 11.5, and I received boots size 10.5 AUS? It doesn’t make any sense, I should have been sent either the 11.5 that I ordered (by mistake), or a size 8.5 AUS (which is the equivalent to an 11.5 US). The antique brown is super cute, so I’ll be returning these and reordering the correct size!  FYI I would not recommend ordering half sizes (wide) for women. It is important to note that these 550 boots are unisex, meaning they are naturally wider to accommodate men’s feet. I am a female with average width feet, there was really no need to get a size wide in a unisex boot. I’m confident I can wear thick socks without the extra width. The boots are by no means slim, they’re rather chunky, so any extra width is going to make them look bulkier.

类型: Size: 11 US Men / 13 US Women / 10 AUColor: Rustic Brown
评论详情: Bought these boots for kitchen work, they feel like very solid boots, I wear US size 11 and the AUS 10 fits slightly large on me, but with a pair of thick socks they fit perfect, slightly loose without the thick socks. I added dr.scholls insert since I plan to be on my feet 8+ hours at a time. If you plan to do messy work in them I would stray away from the suede like leathers as theyre harder to clean. Very happy with my purchase.

评论详情: These might be the most comfortable boots I own right now. Very little break-in involved. Still some heel slippage, but it's not too bad at all. I've considered sizing down by a half-size, but I think that overall they are true to size.  Easy to put on and take off, too!

The color and quality are good, but it is not true to size! I always buy 11 for my hubby, but this shoes are terribly wide !! Also, in the package I received, there is a piece of melted chocolate inside the box! I do not know if it came from the last customer who returned the shoes???? Another thing is about size tag, there is no size tag inside the shoes, but on the bottom of the shoes soles, it shows"10". It is so confusing since I ordered size 11.
